::Dollen::

He gets in. 
"Thanks. Those fire balls are a pain in the processor."

::Hot Rod::

He was blasted back by the missiles. His chect plate was tarnished.
"I never needed the Matrix. I'll destroy you without much trouble."
He activates his thrustors and rockets at Sharpedge, swiping with his
saw.

::Demolition::

He is blasted to the ground, uncouncious. Again!
